alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 10:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Meade and central Pennington Counties through 1115 PM MDT... At 1043 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Black Hawk to 5 miles northeast of Railroad Buttes. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Underwood around 1100 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Owanka and Wicksville. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 45 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
